Public MustInherit Class TemplateControl Inherits Control Implements IFilterResolutionService, INamingContainer

summary.span: 为 类和 类提供了一组基本功能。

span.span: Provides the class and the class with a base set of functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类, 它为类和类提供公共属性和方法。 The class is an abstract class that provides common properties and methods for the class and the class. 不会直接创建的新实例。A new instance of the is not created directly. 类定义支持声明性数据绑定表达式的方法:The class defines methods supporting declarative data-binding expressions: - 将方法用于涉及数据源的数据绑定表达式, 如简单的属性或表达式。Use the method for data-binding expression involving data sources, such as simple properties or expressions. - 使用方法来分析和计算 XPath 数据绑定表达式。Use the method for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression. - 对包含 XPath select 语句的表达式使用数据绑定方法。Use the method for data-binding against an expression containing an XPath select statement. 结果是实现接口的节点集合。The result is a node collection that implements the interface. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息, 请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)和[到数据库的绑定](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on data-binding expression, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca) and [Binding to Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何`MyControl` 从类派生一个名为的控件并重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a control named `MyControl` from the class and override the method. 初始化`MyControl`时, 将调用重写的方法。When `MyControl` is initialized, the overridden method is called. [!code-csharp[TemplateControl_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/CS/tempcontrol_samples1.ascx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TemplateControl_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/VB/tempcontrol_samples1.ascx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当用户结束交易时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user ends a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件注册自定义事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to register a custom event handler for the event. 由于是抽象类, 因此此代码示例使用类, 该类派生自类。Because is an abstract class, this code example uses the class, which is derived from the class. `Account`是支持`Debit`操作的类, 该操作是事务性的, 必须作为一个单元执行。`Account` is a class that supports a `Debit` operation, which is transactional and must execute as a unit. 如果在此操作过程中引发任何异常, 则事务将结束。If any exception is raised during this operation, the transaction is ended. [!code-csharp[TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction/CS/templatecontrol_oncommittransaction.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction/VB/templatecontrol_oncommittransaction.vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Transaction Processing

summary.span: 获取或设置从中解析和编译控件的文件的相对于应用程序的虚拟目录路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the application-relative, virtual directory path to the file from which the control is parsed and compiled.

value.span: 一个表示该路径的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当定义控件的文件位于处理请求的页面之外的目录中时, 使用属性将应用程序相对虚拟路径返回到。When the file that defines a control resides in a directory other than that of the page processing the request, use the property to return the application-relative, virtual path to the . 根据属性中设置的虚拟路径设置属性。The property is set based on the virtual path that is set in the property.

span.span: The path that is set is .

exception.span: 设置的路径不是基于根路径的路径。

span.span: The path that is set is not rooted.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示主题是否应用于派生自 类的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether themes apply to the control that is derived from the class.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为从类派生的控件启用主题。 The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control that is derived from the class. 当属性为`true`时, 将在应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。 When the property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply. 如果主题目录中不存在特定控件的外观, 则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序级别的资源存储在 App_GlobalResources 文件夹中。Application-level resources are stored in the App_GlobalResources folder. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 应用程序中的资源](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/1ztca10y(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Resources in ASP.NET Applications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/1ztca10y(v=vs.85)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法从 App_GlobalResources 文件夹中名为`MyResource.resx`的`GlobalResourceString1`全局资源访问名为的字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to access a string named `GlobalResourceString1` from a global resource named `MyResource.resx` in the App_GlobalResources folder. `className` 参数`MyResource`不带 .resx 扩展名。The `className` parameter is `MyResource` without the .resx extension. summary.span: 加载 。

span.span: Loads a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将控件加载到容器控件中时, 容器将引发所有添加的控件的事件, 直到它达到当前事件。When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event. 但是, 已添加的控件不会与回发数据的处理保持同步。However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing. 为了使已添加的控件参与回发数据处理 (包括验证), 必须在事件中而不是在事件中添加控件。For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the event rather than in the event.

span.span: ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件支持缓存, 则从方法返回的对象实际上并不是对象; 而是对象。If the control supports caching, the object returned from the method is not actually a object; rather, it is a object. 如果参数`virtualPath`是相对的, 则加载的控件的路径相对于的路径。If the `virtualPath` parameter is relative, the path of the loaded control is relative to the path of the . 当您将控件加载到容器控件中时, 容器将引发所有添加的控件的事件, 直到它达到当前事件。When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event. 但是, 已添加的控件不会与回发数据的处理保持同步。However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing. 为了使已添加的控件参与回发数据处理 (包括验证), 必须在事件中而不是在事件中添加控件。For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the event rather than in the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将用户控件添加到 ASP.NET 页。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add a user control to an ASP.NET page. 在事件方法中, 此页使用方法以编程方式在页面上创建用户控件。 `OnInit`In the `OnInit` event method, this page uses the method to programmatically create a user control on the page. 方法将控件添加到名为 `Placeholder1`的 Web 服务器控件的属性。The method adds the control to the property of a Web server control named `Placeholder1`. 有关此代码示例中`MyControl`使用的类的定义, 请参见。 For the definition of the `MyControl` class that is used in this code example, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户控件支持缓存, 则从方法返回的对象实际上并不是对象; 而是对象。If the user control supports caching, the object returned from the method is not actually a object; rather, it is a object. 当您将控件加载到容器控件中时, 容器将引发所有添加的控件的事件, 直到它达到当前事件。When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event. 但是, 已添加的控件不会与回发数据的处理保持同步。However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing. 为了使已添加的控件参与回发数据处理 (包括验证), 必须在事件中而不是在事件中添加控件。For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the event rather than in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是接口的一部分, 它特定于控件在设计器环境中使用设备筛选器的方式。 The method is part of the interface, which is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer environment. 当在浏览器请求上下文之外的设计器环境中分析或保存控件时, 提供一种方法来确定当前控件是否受命名筛选器的影响, 以及命名筛选器是否是特定设备筛选器层次结构。When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer environment outside the context of a browser request, the provides a way to determine if the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用方法调用方法来解析计算表达式时所依据的对象引用。 The method calls the method using the method to resolve the object reference that the expression is evaluated against. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在控件中使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1/cs/templatecontrolxpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1/vb/templatecontrolxpathvb.aspx#1)] 以下测试 XML 数据可用于前面的代码示例。The following test XML data can be used in the preceding code example. ``` contact name 1 contact note 1 contact name 2 contact note 2 ```

exception.span: 数据绑定方法只能用于 中包含的控件。

span.span: The data-binding method can be used only for controls contained on a .
